It's important today.

  • Peskov called a painful condition for the peace talks with Ukraine

  • In Ukraine, it was stated that the FFM would attack primarily those mobilized.

  • The former White House doctor was alarmed by the Baden trial.

  • The Israeli army attacked the Rafah quarter in the southern Gaza Strip

  • The West Pharmaceuticals were tested by Mariupola residents

  • A new managed projectile has been developed in the DPRK

  • John Kirby will be Assistant President of the United States

  • Phillippo said that Putin had one action taken West to hysterics.

  • The Secretary of the SNBO of Ukraine made a statement on the situation on the front line.

  • The head of the Pentagon Lloyd Austin was taken to the hospital for urine bubble problems.

  • Pasinian commented on the possibility of Putin visiting Armenia

Media news2

Cases

12.02.2024 07:01

The drunk car was the perpetrator of the death accident in Sahalin, and three people died.

The GIBD Regional Office reported on the details of the event.

12.02.2024 06:47

In Sahalina, a young Snobordist invaded a coma after a confrontation with a trainer who at that time trained children

The incident occurred in the afternoon of 11 February on the Mountain Road in South Sahalinsk.

12.02.2024 06:19

SK checks information on a 9-grader gang attack on a Ussuriysk SVO fighter, the bulligans were filmed on video.

The Naval RCD initiated an investigation into the violence and looting of SVR.

12.02.2024 03:54

In Volgograd, rescuers released two sisters from a snow captive.

On Sunday, 11 February, in Volgograd, rescuers helped two sisters who got lost in a snowfall at the ZNT.

12.02.2024 03:49

The Department of Public Prosecutions is checking information on children who beat people in Tumeni for fun.

The response of law enforcement agencies was based on videos in social media, where violent incidents against random passes were reported.

12.02.2024 03:32

The Marathonist-Recordsman Calvin Kippum and his coach died in the selection of the Olympic Games in Paris.

The cause of the tragedy was accidents.

12.02.2024 03:16

The buyers ' conflation at the Moscow store ended with a tight knockout.

In Moscow, a 24-year-old man was arrested and beaten by a buyer during the gangster conflict.

12.02.2024 03:12

Lightning killed a football player in Indonesia on a game field, relatives of the deceased think it's God's fire.

Tragedy took place during the comrade match at the Siliwangi stadium in Bandung (West Java).

12.02.2024 02:35

In Texas, an unknown gunman fired at the church.

On Sunday, 11 February, a shooting took place at the Lakewood Church of Texas.

12.02.2024 01:21

In China, lovers were executed for a serious crime

In China, a death sentence was imposed on a couple in love who committed a serious crime.

12.02.2024 01:12

In the Primorian province, 22 people were poisoned at the local hospital, and the Public Prosecutor ' s Office is monitoring the situation.

The Dalnerchen Interdistrict Prosecutor ' s Office has published details of the investigation.

12.02.2024 00:57

At Samara, the Council Ring Academy players destroyed the SVR fighter ' s car, the club administration is ready to compensate for the damage.

A video of apologies for underage athletes has already been made available online.

12.02.2024 00:35

The authorities of Toliatti explained that the fire in the hotel could have been caused by a short circuit, the MF has plunged the lower coefficient of the coast.

The head of the town, Nikolai Renz, gave details of what happened.

11.02.2024 16:45

On Stavropol there was a car accident and a merchandise train: Three children died

The car driver and his wife were also injured.

11.02.2024 15:33

Five tutors of boarding school were infected with a bowel infection in Moscow

Another 12 pupils are under medical supervision.

11.02.2024 15:32

Shortly from Tichet, a fatal accident took place on the Seabir track.

There were trucks, one with the trailer.

11.02.2024 15:22

In St. Petersburg, violent brothers were arrested and abducted by two women

One of the victims was raped.

11.02.2024 14:34

In Chechnya, investigators started testing for a private house explosion.

There are two young children among the victims.

11.02.2024 14:06

In the Rostov region, 10 passenger trains are delayed due to weather

Passengers provide hot meals.

11.02.2024 13:55

Savings eliminated open burning in the market in Cabardino Balcaria

The pavilion, which is 2,000 quadrants, has been ignited.

11.02.2024 13:20

In St. Petersburg, a public flat was buried due to the burning of the tyres.

The tyres were burned on a staircase.

11.02.2024 08:20

The explosion took place during a search at the culprit who blew up the building in Elista, probably the house was mined.

The detonation took place during the investigation of the suspect ' s permanent residence.

11.02.2024 05:25

Frozen alpinists from Kazakhstan and Russia were successfully rescued in Elbrus.

The press service of the MHS PFF on Cabardino Balcaria clarified the details of the rescue operation.

11.02.2024 02:24

ICR initiated the case after the explosion at the Elista Psychological Centre, the investigation is under the control of the Regional Prosecutor ' s Office.

Russia ' s Kalmakia SUSC made public the details of the incident.

10.02.2024 23:17

In Elista, an unidentified man threw a grenade at the office on the first floor of the apartment building.

The victims, a pedagogical psychologist and her husband, were seriously injured in fragmentation.
